description: Interactive game to improve math skills by executing a kata to become a math jedi! It presents a series of challenges at varying levels in addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division. You can try to answer each problem, and the game also allows hints, repeats, skips, more time to solve the problem, and provides solutions when asked. It keeps track of some statistics to show how well you did in the session. It's a great way to sharpen your mathematical saw!
exampleInteractions: Alexa, tell Math Kata to start an easy addition game.
Alexa, tell Math Kata to begin a new kata.
name: Math Kata
shortDescription: Interactive game to improve math skills by executing a kata to become a math jedi!
